name: Casual
definition: A relaxed style suitable for everyday wear.

name: Formal
definition: A formal style for special occasions.

name: Business Casual
definition: A style that blends formal and casual wear, ideal for office settings.

name: Sporty
definition: A comfortable style for active individuals.

name: Elegant
definition: A sophisticated style for formal events.

name: Summer Casual
definition: Light and breezy styles perfect for summer outings.

name: Winter Warmth
definition: Cozy styles designed for colder weather.

name: Beachwear
definition: Light and comfortable clothing for beach outings.

name: Athletic Wear
definition: Functional clothing for sports and exercise.

name: Vintage
definition: Classic styles inspired by past decades.

name: Bohemian
definition: A free-spirited style with artistic flair.

name: Punk
definition: A rebellious style with bold elements.

name: Chic
definition: A stylish and sophisticated look.

name: Grunge
definition: A relaxed style with a slightly messy look.

name: Preppy
definition: A classic style often associated with Ivy League schools.

name: Romantic
definition: Soft and feminine styles with delicate details.

name: Streetwear
definition: Casual styles inspired by urban culture.

name: Loungewear
definition: Comfortable clothing for relaxing at home.

name: Festival
definition: Bright and colorful styles for music festivals.

name: Office Wear
definition: Professional styles suitable for the workplace.

name: Retro
definition: A nostalgic style that brings back classic trends.

name: Athleisure
definition: A combination of athletic and leisurewear for casual outings.

name: Edgy
definition: A bold and unconventional style with unique elements.

name: Minimalist
definition: A clean and simple style focusing on essentials.

name: Cottagecore
definition: A romantic style inspired by rural life and nature.

name: High Fashion
definition: Trendy and avant-garde styles that push fashion boundaries.

name: Layered
definition: A style that incorporates multiple layers for depth and texture.

name: Sport Luxe
definition: A luxurious take on athletic wear, blending comfort with elegance.
